DOC.brief_summary: We aimed to compare efficacy and safety of combination therapy with oral ofloxacin, 400 mg twice daily, plus oral metronidazole, 500 mg twice daily, for 14 days, with moxifloxacin monotherapy, 400 mg once daily, for 14 days
DOC.brief_title: Moxifloxacin Versus Ofloxacin Plus Metronidazole in Uncomplicated Pelvic Inflammatory Disease: Multicenter Randomized Controlled Trials
